snippet: A group of countries led by Russia and China are trying to undermine the open spirit of the Internet by seeking more control and regulations.
abstract: Editorial warns that group of countries led by Russia and China are trying to undermine open spirit of Internet by seeking more control and regulations as representatives of 193 countries meet in Dubai to update International Telecommunications Regulations treaty.
lead_paragraph: A group of countries led by Russia and China are trying to undermine the open spirit of the Internet by seeking more control and regulations.

keywords.value: Internet Corp for Assigned Names and Numbers
keywords.name: organizations
